Articles.Content: KSP should run that. It would be SO AWESOME.
I think so too. But do make KSP into HD it would take weeks i think.
thats pretty cool video of earth..wait a minute..thats not earth...IT A FREAKIN GAME ENGINE!

How can any computer run this?

Holy. NASA.

How can any computer run this?

Holy. NASA.

Hardware requirements aren\'t that bad

Hardware requirements

Outerra engine runs on OpenGL 3.3 and requires recent graphics drivers. It will warn you if your drivers are outdated, or even refuse to run in case you\'ve got old ATI drivers that are known not to work at all.

The minimum requirements are:

Nvidia 8800GT or better, ATI 4850 or better

512MB GPU memory

a 2-core CPU

Recommended:

Nvidia 460GTX or better, ATI 6850 or better

1GB GPU memory

I\'ll download the demo later on to see what its like.
